devdoc.details: Contract for managing crop investment agreements where farmers tokenize crops and investors can choose between receiving produce or sharing profits

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

claimCollateral(uint256).details: Claim collateral when deadlines are missed (called by investor)

confirmDelivery(uint256).details: Confirm delivery (can be called by anyone for conceptual testing)

fundAgreement(uint256,uint8).details: Fund an agreement and choose fulfilment option

params.agreementId: The ID of the agreement to fund
params.option: The chosen fulfilment option (DELIVER_PRODUCE or SHARE_PROFITS)

markHarvestReady(uint256).details: Mark harvest as ready (called by farmer)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.deliveryOrSaleDeadline: Deadline for delivery or sale completion
params.investorShareBps: Basis points (1/10,000) of sale proceeds for investor if SHARE_PROFITS
params.nftTokenId: Token ID of the crop NFT

returns._0: agreementId The ID of the created agreement

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

reportSale(uint256,uint256).details: Report sale and distribute proceeds (called by farmer for SHARE_PROFITS option)

params.saleAmount: Total amount received from crop sale

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: InvestmentAgreement
